name: Escape ! (Pik_style)
description:
Welcome to Escape!

In this game still in development, you must escape from a maze without being caught by bad guys! You will find random plates that will teleport you to the next level. 

Be careful! There are traps in the maze, but if you are lucky you can get bonuses! 

As I said, the game is in beta, there are only 4 levels for the moment
